entry.title: WIND WARNING, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 p.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Rain beginning in the evening then changing to periods of snow overnight. Snow level 2500 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
